 2007-13542007-09-18,  ,  HEALTH,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (FLAME RESISTANCE TEST METHOD) by replacing references to an English-only U.S. standard for testing the flammability of certain textiles with references to a bilingual standard developed by the Canadian General Standards Board.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0206 Publication Date: 2007-10-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (FLAME RESISTANCE TEST METHOD) by replacing references to an English-only U.S. standard for testing the flammability of certain textiles with references to a bilingual standard developed by the Canadian General Standards Board.
